feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add link column to CSV file for org members by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17695
  • feat: AI description - DB model + frontend + backend (fetch only) by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17651
  • chore: v4.7.3 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17701

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.2...v4.7.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Added more supported languages by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17702
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17704
  • chore: Remove faulty languages for Replexica by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17705
  • feat: v2 subsequent recurring booking cancellation by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17645
  • feat: DataTable component should use a "key" of data as the selection key by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17714
  • chore: add default reading direction to atoms wrapper by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17710
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @replexicabot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17712
  • fix: provide explicit column width for member list by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17718
  • feat: add instant meeting parameter by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17647
  • feat: enable all users to create platform team by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17707
  • feat: Add column visibility filters to routing insights table by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17715
  • perf: get event types by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17689
  • fix: calendar settings atom modifications by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17579
  • docs: update oauth by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17671
  • fix: add default schedule while creating org member by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16855
  • feat: Autofill feature by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15437
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17722
  • fix: correct domain for link column in org member table by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17726
  • revert: "feat: Populate gCal calendar cache via webhooks (#11928)"" by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17682
  • chore: v4.7.4 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17728

New Contributors

  • @replexicabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17712

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.3...v4.7.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: cron api key checks by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17730
  • chore: booking status reporting by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17733
  • fix: platform libraries build vite.config by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17743
  • fix: request reschedule for round-robin events with "reschedule with same round-robin host" shows no availability by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17734
  • feat: Salesforce: Write booking question values to attendee record in Salesforce [CAL-4731] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17650
  • feat: adds last active timestamp by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17261
  • fix: identify org-wide features per user by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17010
  • chore: v4.7.5 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17750

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.4...v4.7.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: PostHog event tracking by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17653
  • fix: fix wrong dates on OOO edit dialog by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17736
  • fix: Better error handling for user session by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17753
  • chore: routing table nits by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17738
  • fix: upgrade prismock to 1.33.4 by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17735
  • feat: Attribute filter/Segment for Round Robin hosts by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17361
  • chore: Add support for new docker compose command to run V2 API by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17744
  • feat: add text filter on org member list by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17632
  • feat: v2 expose booking metadata by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17708
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17757
  • fix: Log error correctly in login flow by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17755
  • fix: common schedule toggle for team event in never uncheckable by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17759
  • feat: Don't remove hosts when disabling 'Add all team members' by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17747
  • chore: v4.7.6 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17766

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.5...v4.7.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: install gcal + gvideo by default for google signups by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17773
  • ci: Re-drafts PR when changes are requested by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17137
  • fix: no availability on reschedule with load balancing by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17770
  • fix: temporarily revert stricter schema so we can handle invalid DB eâ€¦ by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17774
  • feat: Record assignment reasons for routing form and reassignment by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17767
  • chore: add rescheduled by property by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17631
  • feat: Record Salesforce ownership assignment by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17775
  • fix: extract clientId header manually apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17783
  • fix: short text booking questions does not save when we click add by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17778
  • chore: Release v4.7.7 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17786

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.6...v4.7.7
